posts.post_content:
In comparison to [Palladia-Mors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Palladia-Mors), he has better art, better flavor, better story...  
But no trample. If you are not cheating him out early(go you), or putting trample giving cards in the deck([soulbright flamekin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=soulbright flamekin)?), or giving him the tim ability, he just isn't better. Trample is so crazy powerful that it hurts my soul to see badasses like this stopped by a falcon.
posts.html:
